name: 黃柏鈞
objective:
This course concentrated on the establishment of solid proficiencies in conducting premium-quality research works in general computer science areas. Instead of classical courses, this course requires that all classmates team up together and collaborate to complete a mini-sized research project in a semester.

Reminder: A majority part of this course will be given in English.
schedule:
1. Fundamental research tools and methods
2. General systems thinking methods
3. Critical thinking
4. Planning of graduate-student life and career life
5. Attending technical conferences and presentation techniques
6. Journal paper preparing and revising techniques
7. Academic ethical issues
8. Collaboration and team leading techniques
9. Finding research topics, defining research problems, and proposing technical solutions
10. Meeting techniques and effective communication
11. Group discussion and thesis writing
12. Special-topic talks and interactive panels on most recent technological advances in computer sciences.
scorePolicy:
(Tentative)
Semester report 50%
Participation and talk report 50%
